scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=. pytest
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:coverage:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=. pytest --cov
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && flake8 app tests && mypy app
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.lint:fix:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && black app tests && isort app tests
scripts.lint:fix:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && black app tests && isort app tests
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install -r requirements-dev.txt
